venueName: The Living Room at The Dewberry

pages.text:
[Page Title: Dining | The Dewberry Charleston]

DINING

Charleston’s Award-Winning Hotel Dining Outlets
Dine & imbibe over high-quality, ingredient-driven dishes and handcrafted cocktails at our outlets The Living Room and Citrus Club. 
The Living Room

Hours of Operation:

Sunday - Thursday | 7 AM – 11 PMFriday - Saturday | 7 AM – 12 AM

Seating is first come, first served.
Menu 843-872-9063 
Experience the gracious hospitality and effortless style of a true Charleston living room. Outfitted with mid-century furnishings, a curated reading library and a showstopping brass bar, our Living Room is a warm and welcoming destination for morning coffee, afternoon cocktails or an evening aperitif. Every detail--right down to the wooden bowls hand-crafted by local artist Hugh Jeffers from the knots of a 150-year-old white oak tree that once stood nearby--echoes The Dewberry's rich history. To view our policies click .
here 
Citrus Club

Sunday - Wednesday: 12pm-8pm

Thursday - Saturday: 12pm-10pm
Menu 
The crown jewel in a city known for its steepled skyline and sea-skimming views, The Dewberry’s 8th floor terrace features the highest rooftop in Charleston. Home to our whimsical rooftop cocktail bar, Citrus Club, features citrus-inspired cocktails, and fresh lite bites. Seating is first come, first served. To view our policies click .
here

[Page Title: Events in Charleston SC | The Dewberry Charleston]

MEETINGS & EVENTS

Memorable Events In Charleston

Echoing Charleston’s historic charm and architectural grace, The Dewberry has become a sought-after event setting for those who appreciate timeless elegance, historic preservation and artistic collaboration. As with every experience at our Charleston hotel, the venues for meetings and special events are the city’s best in class, acknowledged for both flawless service and unerring decorative style. You’ll feel it the moment your eyes meet the cast brass and crystal palmetto chandelier in the Ballroom or step into our intimate ivy-covered Charleston Walled Garden. This is subtle Charleston glamour at its best.
Wedding Guide Meeting Guide 
Ballroom & Walled Garden
Highlights include: 
Ballroom: 1,710 sq ft.

Walled Garden: 2,400 sq ft.

Accommodates up to 200 guests

Ballroom & Walled Garden
1,710 SQ FT. 36 x 47.5 FT. CEILING HEIGHT: 15’ 
Meeting Room Setups

85 guests
Classroom 
42 guests
U Shaped 
220 guests
Theatre 
Banquet Setups

160 guests
Ceremony 
175 guests
Reception 
150 guests
Rounds Start Planning Learn More 
A modern setting of remarkable warmth and elegance, our Ballroom evokes old Charleston in attitude and aesthetic. A Viennese cast- brass palmetto chandelier and oversized gilded antique mirrors set the mood in this stylish 1,750-square-foot space accommodating up to 150 guests. White Oak parquet floors reminiscent of Versailles, as well as works by Charleston artist Douglas Balentine, specially commissioned for The Dewberry, add to the room’s opulent atmosphere.

Just beyond the Ballroom lies our traditional Charleston Walled Garden, featuring live oaks, historic brick walls draped by English ivy, bluestone walkways, and a raised garden.

Rivers Room & NORTH TERRACE
Highlights include: 
Rivers Room: 1,400 sq ft.

Accommodates up to 150 guests

Rivers Room & NORTH TERRACE
Rivers Room 1,400 SQ FT. Start Planning Learn More Located on the hotel’s 8floor, the Rivers Room is a one-of-kind space not to be found anywhere else in Charleston. With indoor and outdoor capabilities, the space boasts sweeping views of the Charleston Harbor and Arthur Ravenel Jr. Bridge to the east and unparalleled views of Marion Square and the steepled skyline of the Holy City to the west. With 15 foot ceilings, this space provides beautiful natural lighting. Access the north outdoor terrace, and soak in the 360 degree views of the Charleston harbor and steepled skyline. th 
HOSPITALITY SUITE
Highlights include: 
511 sq ft.

Accommodates up to 12 guests

HOSPITALITY SUITE
511 SQ FT Start Planning Learn More 
Situated on the second floor, the Hospitality Suite is an intimate private space perfectly suited to host a business meeting, small corporate event, or staging site for an event such as a wedding.

Outfitted with mid-century furnishings, a curated reading library and a showstopping brass bar, our Living Room is a warm and welcoming destination for morning coffee, afternoon cocktails or an evening aperitif. [Page Title: Happenings | The Dewberry Charleston]

Happenings

Private Mixology Class

.

from classic cocktails to spirit-free refreshments.
Join our nationally recognized team for a private lesson in mastering mixology Learn the art of imbibing—from crafting the classics to decanting the perfect vintage to the particulars of bourbon—all while taking a peek at how the magic happens. Tailored to specific preferences and interests, in the class you will learn how to craft and enjoy three cocktails, accompanied by lite bites. Exclusively for hotel guests, pricing is tailored to the type of lesson and length of class. Classes are subject to availability and are made on a first come, first serve basis with a cancellation policy. Reserve Learn More 
WELLNESS WITH A VIEW

.
Join us every Saturday for a mat pilates class with a view, in partnership with The Longevity Club. Water, towels, and mats are provided. Space is limited—reserve your spot below. Walk-ins welcome upon availability. Book Now Learn More 
Sewe Artist in Residence: Thomas Swanston

.

We are thrilled to welcome back artist and conservationist Thomas Swanston in The Living Room and watch him create stunning depictions of sandhill cranes using his signature gilding techniques and ethereal color to celebrate migratory journeys and nature. His permanent "Migration Series" is located in The Swanston Room outside of the ballroom. This 22-panel installation of cranes gilded in silver, pewter, and 22-carat gold was created in collaboration with John Dewberry.

Friday 2/13 - Sunday 2/15
Learn More 
DESTINATION: CHARLESTON

Bordering Marion Square, The Dewberry is a local landmark, as well as a marquee destination for residents and visitors alike.
See Full Map @thedewberrycharleston Image about Image about Image about Image about Image about

[Page Title: Charleston Hotel Deals | The Dewberry Charleston]

Special Offers & packages

FALL INTO WINTER

Embrace Charleston’s quieter season this winter. Stay two or three nights between December 1, 2025, and March 6, 2026, and enjoy 15% savings. Wake to serene mornings at The Dewberry and wander historic streets just beyond our doors—your winter escape awaits.
book Now Offer details 
15% savings on 2-3 night stays Blackout dates may apply All room types
Discount: Restrictions: Applicable Rooms: 
Complimentary Fourth Night

Make the most of your time in Charleston with our Fourth Night Complimentary offer. Reserve a three-night stay at The Dewberry and enjoy a fourth night with our compliments—giving you more time to unwind, explore, and experience all that our award-winning property and city have to offer. Offer valid through September 30, 2026.
book Now Offer details Offer stay dates: June 3, 2025 - September 30, 2026 Offer booking dates: June 3, 2025 - September 30, 2026 Discount: Stay 3 nights and receive your fourth night complimentary Restrictions: lackout dates may apply. B Deposit and cancellation policies: 72 hours Applicable rooms: All room types 
PERKS OF PLANNING

Experience Southern Reimagined™: take in the sunset from Citrus Club’s terrace, enjoy brunch on the patio before a bike ride through historic Charleston, or explore the Lowcountry with our Volvo Drive Program. However you plan to enjoy the city, receive 10% savings when you book 21 days in advance. After all, there are perks to planning.
book Now Offer details 
10% off when booked 21 days prior to arrival The offer requires a two-night minimum stay and is fully pre-paid at the time of booking. It is non-refundable and cannot be changed or canceled. The promotion is subject to availability, and blackout dates may apply. It is valid for new reservations only and cannot be applied to group bookings or combined with other offers. Taxes and gratuities are not included. All room types
Discount: Restrictions: Applicable Rooms: 
Unwind Midweek

DINING

Charleston’s Award-Winning Hotel Dining Outlets
Dine & imbibe over high-quality, ingredient-driven dishes and handcrafted cocktails at our outlets The Living Room and Citrus Club. 
The Living Room

Hours of Operation:

Sunday - Thursday | 7 AM – 11 PMFriday - Saturday | 7 AM – 12 AM

Seating is first come, first served.
Menu 843-872-9063 
Experience the gracious hospitality and effortless style of a true Charleston living room. Outfitted with mid-century furnishings, a curated reading library and a showstopping brass bar, our Living Room is a warm and welcoming destination for morning coffee, afternoon cocktails or an evening aperitif. Every detail--right down to the wooden bowls hand-crafted by local artist Hugh Jeffers from the knots of a 150-year-old white oak tree that once stood nearby--echoes The Dewberry's rich history.
